医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
患有蛋清过敏的成年人面临着生活质量的重大挑战研究表明，患有鸡蛋清过敏的成年人的生活质量会受到严重损害，这凸显了准确的食品标签和进一步研究有效治疗方法的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Adults-with-egg-white-allergy-face-significant-quality-of-life-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Adults-with-egg-white-allergy-face-significant-quality-of-life-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=948670eb-6acf-4f27-b346-56ddd1e7daf3 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 21:50:00 -0500 Adults with egg white allergy face significant quality of life challenges
童年社会劣势与多发性硬化症严重程度增加有关根据 11 月 27 日发表的一项研究，在儿童时期患有多发性硬化症 (MS) 并在条件较差的社区长大的人，在影像学上可能比在条件较好的社区长大的人有更多的炎症和脑组织损失。 2024年，美国神经病学学会医学杂志Neurology在线期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Childhood-social-disadvantage-linked-to-increased-MS-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Childhood-social-disadvantage-linked-to-increased-MS-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ca3f523-24e9-43e2-8198-4435be60f8ee Wed, 27 Nov 2024 21:49:45 -0500 Childhood social disadvantage linked to increased MS severity
基于 mRNA 的新型疗法为增殖性玻璃体视网膜病变 Mass Eye And Ear-Le 患者带来了希望... Mass Eye and Ear 研究人员进行的一项新的临床前研究表明，一种新型的基于 mRNA 的疗法可能能够预防视网膜脱离修复或眼睛外伤后增殖性玻璃体视网膜病变 (PVR) 造成的失明和疤痕。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Novel-mRNA-based-therapy-offers-hope-for-患者-with-proliferative-vitreoretinopathy-Mass-Eye-And-Ear-Le.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Novel-mRNA-based-therapy-offers-hope-for-病人-with-proliferative-vitreoretinopathy-Mass-Eye-And-Ear-Le.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f372da83-0259-4383-aa84-866ad9062c0f Wed, 27 Nov 2024 21:47:20 -0500 Novel mRNA-based therapy offers hope for patients with proliferative vitreoretinopathy Mass Eye And Ear-Le...
斯坦福大学团队利用自然细胞死亡机制杀死癌细胞我们的身体每天通过细胞剔除和更新的自然过程（称为细胞凋亡）剥离 600 亿个细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Stanford-team-uses-natural-cell-death-mechanism-to-kill-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Stanford-team-uses-natural-cell-death-mechanism-to-kill-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=148a3673-9963-4d4b-8b88-86c9f0a020f7 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 21:43:09 -0500 Stanford team uses natural cell death mechanism to kill cancer cells
基于DNA的纳米机器人手可以阻止病毒并实现快速诊断伊利诺伊大学厄巴纳-香槟分校用单段 DNA 折叠而成的微小四指“手”可以拾取导致 COVID-19 的病毒，进行高度灵敏的快速检测，甚至可以阻止病毒颗粒进入细胞进行感染研究人员报告。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/DNA-based-nanorobotic-hand-could-block-viruses-and-enable-rapid-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/DNA-based-nanorobotic-hand-could-block-viruses-and-enable-rapid-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4d94ca9-ae11-4e99-86d2-e1f79b10278e Wed, 27 Nov 2024 21:39:53 -0500 DNA-based nanorobotic hand could block viruses and enable rapid diagnostics
HPV 疫苗可显着降低宫颈癌死亡率25 岁以下女性的宫颈癌死亡率急剧下降，MUSC Hollings 癌症中心的研究人员认为这可能是由于 HPV 疫苗接种所致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/HPV-vaccine-linked-to-significant-decline-in-cervical-cancer-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/HPV-vaccine-linked-to-significant-decline-in-cervical-cancer-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef0aa594-7c55-4c65-b813-d1e3f325907f Wed, 27 Nov 2024 21:36:09 -0500 HPV vaccine linked to significant decline in cervical cancer mortality
研究表明蛋白质流动性缺陷是慢性疾病的关键因素2 型糖尿病和炎症性疾病等慢性疾病对人类产生巨大影响。它们是全球疾病负担和死亡的主要原因，对身体和经济造成负担，而且患有此类疾病的人数正在增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Study-reveals- Protein-mobility-defect-as-a-key-factor-in-chronic-diseases-Chronic-Diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Study-reveals- Protein-mobility-defect-as-a-key-factor-in-chronic-diseases-Chronic-Diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fe6f16f-ba17-4483-a8ca-325de73b736a Wed, 27 Nov 2024 21:34:00 -0500 Study reveals protein mobility defect as a key factor in chronic diseases
TRiC突变被发现会导致儿童大脑发育畸形1992 年，朱迪思·弗莱德曼 (Judith Frydman) 博士发现了一种分子复合物，其在我们所有细胞中都有一个重要用途：正确折叠蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/TRiC-mutations-found-to-cause-developmental-brain-malformations-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/TRiC-mutations-found-to-cause-developmental-brain-malformations-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfb52da8-9d7e-4e2b-8f37-88abf44dc927 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 21:25:45 -0500 TRiC mutations found to cause developmental brain malformations in children
小鼠胃中发现的真菌可能是肠道真菌进化的关键威尔康奈尔医学研究人员领导的新研究表明，在小鼠胃中发现的一种真菌可能是胃肠道内真菌进化的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Fungus-found-in-the-mouse-stomach-may-hold-a-key-to-fungal-evolution-in-the-gut.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Fungus-found-in-the-mouse-stomach-may-hold-a-key-to-fungal-evolution-in-the-gut.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3329161-e662-4ab2-bd4e-cfa4bd4566d8 Wed, 27 Nov 2024 21:19:19 -0500 Fungus found in the mouse stomach may hold a key to fungal evolution in the gut
研究表明“阿尔茨海默病在盘子里”模型可以加速药物发现十年前，研究人员引入了一种研究阿尔茨海默病的新模型。该模型被称为“培养皿中的阿尔茨海默病”，它利用悬浮在凝胶中的成熟脑细胞培养物，在短短六周内重现了人类大脑 10 至 13 年来发生的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Research-shows-Alzheimers-in-a-dish-model-can-accelerate-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241127/Research-shows-Alzheimers-in-a-dish-model-can-accelerate-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d47bf850-55f3-4aab-acaf-5c14fb15bf4b Wed, 27 Nov 2024 21:08:57 -0500 Research shows "Alzheimer's in a dish" model can accelerate drug discovery
